6 ControlDevice::ControlDevice(ros::NodeHandle &nh): nh_(nh)
7 {
8  std::stringstream namespace_sstr;
9  errorShown = false;
10  curDeviceNum=0;
11 
12  rotGain = 0.002;
13  transGain = 0.001;
14 
15  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<masterslave::ControlDeviceConfig> server;
16  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<masterslave::ControlDeviceConfig>::CallbackType f;
17  f = boost::bind(&ControlDevice::configurationCallback,this ,_1,_2);
18  server.setCallback(f);
19 
20 
21  registration();
22  curDeviceType = nh_.getNamespace();
23 
24  // Check if it's a Gamepad or a Spacenav
25  if(strcmp(curDeviceType.c_str(),"/Joy")==0)
26  {
27  deviceSub = nh_.subscribe<sensor_msgs::Joy>("/joy",1,&ControlDevice::controlDeviceCallback, this);
28  ROS_DEBUG("Gamepad");
29  }
30  else if(strcmp(curDeviceType.c_str(),"/Spacenav")==0)
31  {
32  deviceSub = nh_.subscribe<sensor_msgs::Joy>("/spacenav/joy",1,&ControlDevice::controlDeviceCallback, this);
33  ROS_DEBUG("Spacenav");
34  }
35 
36  //Create Subnamespace for each Topic of the same ControlDeviceType
37  namespace_sstr << "node" << curDeviceNum << "/Velocity";
38  axisPub = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::TwistStamped>(namespace_sstr.str().c_str(),1);
39  namespace_sstr.str(std::string());
40 
41  namespace_sstr << "node" << curDeviceNum << "/Buttons";
42  buttonsPub = nh_.advertise<masterslave::Button>(namespace_sstr.str().c_str(),1);
43 
44  // Check if there are some buttons
45  buttonCheck();
46  ros::spin();
47 }
48 
49 ControlDevice::~ControlDevice()
50 {
51  nh_.deleteParam(apiDevice.c_str());
52  nh_.shutdown();
53 }
54 
55 //Registration of the ControlDevice at the API
56 void ControlDevice::registration()
57 {
58  std::stringstream param_sstr;
59  std::string param_str = nh_.getNamespace();
60  do
61  {
62  param_sstr.str(std::string());
63  curDeviceNum ++;
64  param_sstr << "/API" << param_str << "/node" << curDeviceNum;
65  }
66  while(nh_.hasParam(param_sstr.str().c_str()));
67 
68  nh_.setParam(param_sstr.str().c_str(),"ControlDevice");
69  apiDevice = param_sstr.str();
70 }
71 
72 void ControlDevice::buttonCheck()
73 {
74  std::stringstream button_sstream;
75  button_sstream << "button";
76  if(nh_.hasParam(button_sstream.str().c_str()))
77  {
78  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue buttonList;
79  nh_.getParam(button_sstream.str().c_str(),buttonList);
80  for(XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::iterator it=buttonList.begin();it!=buttonList.end();it++)
81  {
82  buttons[std::atoi(it->first.c_str())] = (std::string&)(it->second);
83  ROS_WARN_NAMED("ButtonCheck","found: Functions %s (Button: %s)", ((std::string&)(it->second)).c_str(), it->first.c_str());
84  }
85 
86  }
87 
88 }

90 void ControlDevice::configurationCallback(masterslave::ControlDeviceConfig &config, uint32_t level)
91 {
92  rotGain = config.rotGain;
93  transGain = config.transGain;
94  joyThresh = config.joyThresh;
95  ROS_WARN_STREAM_NAMED("Dynamic Reconfigure","rotGain: " << rotGain << " transGain: " << transGain << " joyThresh: " << joyThresh);
96 }
97 
98 void ControlDevice::controlDeviceCallback(const sensor_msgs::Joy::ConstPtr &joy)
99 {
100  if(joy_old.buttons.empty())
101  {
102  joy_old = *joy;
103  }
104  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped output;
105  sensor_msgs::Joy filteredInput;
106  masterslave::Button outputButton;
107  output.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
108  output.header.frame_id = joy->header.frame_id;
109 
110  for(int i=0;i<6;i++)
111  {
112  filteredInput.axes.push_back(joy->axes[i]);
113  if(fabs(joy->axes[i]) < joyThresh){
114  filteredInput.axes[i] = 0.0;
115  }
116  }
117  if(strcmp(curDeviceType.c_str(),"/Spacenav")==0)
118  {
119  output.twist.linear.y = transGain*filteredInput.axes[1];
120  output.twist.linear.x = transGain*filteredInput.axes[0];
121  output.twist.linear.z = transGain*filteredInput.axes[2];
122  output.twist.angular.y = rotGain*filteredInput.axes[4];
123  output.twist.angular.x = rotGain*filteredInput.axes[3];
124  output.twist.angular.z = rotGain*filteredInput.axes[5];
125  }
126  else if(strcmp(curDeviceType.c_str(),"/Joy")==0)
127  {
128  output.twist.linear.x = transGain*filteredInput.axes[0];
129  output.twist.linear.y = transGain*filteredInput.axes[1];
130  //output.twist.linear.z = transGain*joy->axes[2];
131  output.twist.angular.x = rotGain*filteredInput.axes[3];
132  output.twist.angular.y = rotGain*filteredInput.axes[4];
133  //output.twist.angular.z = rotGain*joy->axes[5];
134 
135  }
136  // iterate through the buttons map and publish every button press with name and value
137  for(std::map<int,std::string>::iterator it=buttons.begin(); it!=buttons.end();it++)
138  {
139 
140  outputButton.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
141  outputButton.header.frame_id = joy->header.frame_id;
142  // Idee: unerreichbare Buttons nicht senden?!
143  ROS_WARN_COND(joy->buttons.capacity()<=it->first&& !errorShown,"Button %d is not accessible",it->first);
144  if(joy->buttons.capacity()<=it->first)
145  {
146  outputButton.state = -1;
147  }
148  else
149  {
150  outputButton.state = joy->buttons[it->first];
151  }
152  outputButton.name = it->second;
153  if(joy->buttons[it->first]!=joy_old.buttons[it->first])
154  {
155  buttonsPub.publish(outputButton);
156  }
157 
158  }
159  errorShown = true;
160 
161  axisPub.publish(output);
162  joy_old = *joy;
163 
164 }

175  ControlDevice device(ControlDeviceNH);
